title: The Demonologist - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/13/21
itunes:title: The Demonologist - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/13/21
description:
George Noory and author John Zaffis discuss his lifelong passion for exploring the unexplained beginning in childhood with his aunt and uncle, famed paranormal investigators Lorraine and Ed Warren, as well as his work with possessed objects, ghosts and his own haunted museum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
